Description

Vindica Secrets of Blood is a pixel-art metroidvania telling an intimate and revolutionary story torn between hope and despair. Set in a dystopian industrial city, it features reactive and expressive platforming, intense combat based around blood control, and a cast of very determined freaks.

History

An authoritarian caste is profiting from the industrial city of Antepea, a well-oiled machine fueled by blood. Our blood. Embody Vindica, with trauma and rage in the veins, and become their worst enemy. No longer their sacrifice, but ready to sacrifice everything for justice.

Features

  • A grim underground industrial city to sabotage: lock gears, slide into vents and conduits of industrial installations, jumps over roofs, run over walls, shutdown machines and hack military complexes.
  • A unique hematokinesis power system: Reallocate your blood flow to sacrifice health but gain powerful blood-based abilities. Combine them, master them and manage the risks taken to develop your own playstyle, both in combat and movement.
  • A repression to fight: get ready with your axe and your blood to defeat worker mechs, military drones, soldiers of the order as well as powerful bosses that can use hematokinesis as well, unleashing a barrage of bloody powers upon you.
  • Forge relationships to help you in your uprising: talk and help your lover Lilas and the revolutionary comrades you met. Obtaing advices, training, items and support that provide new uniques gameplay characteristics to help you on your way towards justice.
  • Immerge yourself in a world shrouded in mystery: investigate, talk, hack, examine and find your own truth between propaganda, madness and obfuscation. The history of this city is full of secrets.

About Sekamelica Games

Boilerplate
Sekamelica Games is the one person studio I founded in late 2022/early 2023 to start my carreer as an indie gamedev after being an employee for 3+ years. I'm working on my game intended for Steam: Vindica Secrets of Blood, as well as doing freelance work in Unity dev for other game studios.
